title: What is the history of human beings in the evolution process? - Quora

response.answer_text: Science has made many attempts to understand the invention of mankind, whose successful results have also been achieved. According to science, the history of human beings is connected to the sea. First of all, living species of water were born like fish, water-borne germs etc.  Gradually the cycle of time continued to grow. The creatures living in the water and in the water came alive and started living their lives like frogs, crab etc. The time changed and nature was doing its work, sometimes flood was ever drought, life was born and death. The evolution of man has also been resolved according to Hindu religion. According to Hindu religion, the great man who took the first life in the world was "Manu". On the basis of which this caste was named mankind.
